title: zpizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Franchise pizzeria offering organic crust and sauce and has Daiya vegan cheese, vegetable toppings, vegan meat crumbles. Has gluten-free and whole wheat crusts. A berkeley vegan pizza on menu (Daiya cheese, soy sausage crumbles, veggies); also a vegetarian calzone that could be made vegan by substituting Daiya cheese.
